biography.value: The most cunning and treacherous of true dragons, green dragons use misdirection and trickery to get the upper hand against their enemies. A green dragon is recognized by the crest that begins near its eyes and continues down its spine, reaching full height just behind the skull.

description.value:
The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 2d6 type=poison average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save con 14 format=long]], taking [[/damage 12d6 type=poison average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Amphibious. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can breathe air and water.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
